product.cushioning: Padded insole provides lasting, basic comfort for all-day casual wear.
product.breathability: Durable canvas upper is breathable, keeping feet cool in warm conditions.
product.short_description: Embrace effortless, street-smart style with the Lugz Women's Clipper Shoe. A true classic in the world of casual footwear, the Clipper is celebrated for its simple, versatile design and rugged durability. These slip-on canvas sneakers are the perfect choice for the woman who values both comfort and an edgy, urban aesthetic. The upper is constructed from durable canvas, offering a breathable and flexible fit that conforms to your foot. The clean, low-profile silhouette and timeless slip-on styling, complete with elastic gore panels for easy on-and-off, make them an incredibly versatile piece that pairs effortlessly with jeans, joggers, or shorts. A padded insole provides lasting comfort for all-day wear, while the signature Lugz outsole, often featuring a distinct tread pattern, adds durability and a touch of industrial-inspired style. Step into a piece of heritage with the Lugz Women's Clipper, the original slip-on sneaker built for the streets.
product.about_this_item: SLIP ON SHOES FOR WOMEN: Elevate your everyday style with the Lugz clipper womens slip on shoes women footwear, designed to blend comfort with classic casual flair. CASUAL SNEAKERS FOR WOMEN: Sturdy canvas upper and vulcanized rubber outsole for grip and durability. WOMENS SLIP ON SHOES: Side gore panels and padded collar for flexible fit and comfort. WOMENS CASUAL SHOES: Versatile and practical for daily wear. LUGZ SHOES: Sleek, comfortable, and fashionable.
product.primary_keyword: Lugz Women's Clipper Slip-On Canvas Shoes
